channel.title: I freeze on my server,

item.title: I freeze on my server,
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Ok, i have added ::pickup for everyone so they wont get bored and im using delta source, but sumtimes people freeze and lagg out but today i was looking around then hit the mage book, and then i frozed and everytime i logg in and hit the mage book it allways freezes does anyone no why?

ive added to my server —>
::pickup

f (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 0) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No Such Item"); } } else { sM("Oops! Use As ::Pickup 995 100"); } } }

and ::notedbarrows —>

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000); }

there the commands i have added to my delta source,… but i need to no why people sumtimes lagg out,

Read full topic
